name: Blippity Strike!
description:
"Blippity Strike!" is a fun casual platformer game that allows you to venture yourself in a cute pixel world to help Ms. Oc in a journey of rescuing her sisters that got captured in the dangerous plain!

Each sister you rescue will give you a new power-up with a completely different mechanic whilst the last sister will give you a upgrade to all your abilities!

Learn new powers, venture in this world, defeat a mighty boss and - the most important part - have fun!

Blippity Strike! can be played on desktop with mouse and keyboard or in mobile devices with the help of a Controller (Yep, that's right, you can play with you controller!).

The game was made by Portal Software on Construct 3.
